verbose_text: We further found that ectopic expression of AY significantly strengthened the occupancy of PCAF, a histone acetyltransferase for acH3K9/14, but reduced the enrichment of SIRT1, a histone deacetylase, on the ITGAV promoter region of -894 to -677.
evidence: AY significantly strengthened the occupancy of PCAF, a histone acetyltransferase for acH3K9/14, but reduced the enrichment of SIRT1
